# myNotebook

This file contains the same code as the file "myScript.R", but in the format of a simple R Notebook.

## Generate data

```text
x <- rnorm(100)
```

## Calculate mean

```text
mean(x)
```

## Histogram

```text
hist(x)
```

## Normal probability plot

```text
qqnorm(x)
```
